value.title: Waymo begins work on dedicated Texas hub for self-driving trucks
value.excerpt: Alphabet-owned Waymo is looking to gain a strong foothold in the nascent autonomous freight industry, today announcing plans to build a dedicated hub for its self-driving trucks in the state of Texas.

value.title: What to expect from Tesla’s AI day event
value.excerpt: It’s been nearly two years since Tesla’s first “Autonomy Day” event, at which CEO Elon Musk made numerous lofty predictions about the future of autonomous vehicles, including his infamous claim that the company would have “one million robotaxis on the road” by the end of 2020.

value.title: Democrats ask FTC to investigate Tesla's self-driving claims
value.excerpt: Two Democratic senators asked the Federal Trade Commission to investigate Tesla over the company’s advertising of its Autopilot and Full Self-Driving technology. The letter comes one day after the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration opened a formal investigation into Tesla’s Autopilot system.

value.title: China EV Maker Warns Terms Like Self Driving May Mislead People
value.excerpt: The Chief Executive Officer of Chinese electric-car maker Li Auto Inc. has said the industry should limit using the terms autonomous and self driving, considering no automobile today is truly capable of that and its common usage is becoming misleading for consumers.
